data.persona: I am a peasant's child. I find it hard to obtain food. I have very little fat on me.
data.description:
You are in the Queen's Bedchamber.
The chamber is fit for royalty. A four-poster beds with a plush mattress adorns the room. A chifforobe of immense value is placed in the room, as is a bell for summoning a horde of servants.
There's a mattress, a jewelry, a plush mattress, a chifferobe, a bell, and a bed here.
The maid and the visitor are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a belt and a rope, and wielding an crystal ball.

data.short_motivation: I want to get the maid and the visitor in trouble.
data.mid_motivation: I want the servants to come rushing into the room, only to find that the maid is having inappropriate relations with the visitor.
data.long_motivation: I want the queen to trust me more and to give me the maid's job.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: steal a crystal ball  from the visitor, who happens to be a seer.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the crystal ball to see the future.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the bell and use it to summon the servants once I am out of the room and the maid and visitor both think I am gone.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the servants into the bed chamber to watch them catching the maid and the visitor doing inappropriate things.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat a celebratory meal after finding out that the maid has lost her job.
